verses.name: Jeremiah 37:15
verses.text: Wherefore the princes were wroth with Jeremiah, and smote him, and put him in prison in the house of Jonathan the scribe: for they had made that the prison.

verses.name: Jeremiah 37:16
verses.text: When Jeremiah was entered into the dungeon, and into the cabins, and Jeremiah had remained there many days;

verses.name: Jeremiah 37:17
verses.text: Then Zedekiah the king sent, and took him out: and the king asked him secretly in his house, and said, Is there any word from the Lord? And Jeremiah said, There is: for, said he, thou shalt be delivered into the hand of the king of Babylon.
